pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Q-CTRL QUA AdapterThe Q-CTRL QUA Adapter package allows you to integrate Boulder Opal with theQUA quantum computing language.See how you can do that in the user guide [How to integrate Boulder Opal withQUA from QuantumMachines](https://docs.q-ctrl.com/boulder-opal/user-guides/how-to-integrate-boulder-opal-with-qua-from-quantum-machines).
